tos.title: Terms & Services
tos.welcome: Welcome to OrgAI.net. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.
tos.acceptanceText: By using OrgAI.net, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Services. If you do not agree, please do not use our site.
tos.descriptionText: OrgAI.net is your premier AI tool directory, dedicated to helping you discover the latest and most effective AI tools tailored to your needs.
tos.ownershipText: OrgAI.net and its content are owned by OrgAI.net. All rights are reserved.
tos.dataCollectionText: We collect the following personal information: name, email, and payment information. Additionally, we collect non-personal data through web cookies. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details: https://orgai.net/en/privacy-policy.
tos.userObligationsText: Users agree not to misuse the site, including but not limited to: - Engaging in unlawful activities. - Uploading harmful or malicious content. - Violating the rights of others.
tos.changesText: We may update these Terms & Services from time to time. Users will be notified of any changes via email.
tos.governingLawText: These Terms & Services are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States.
tos.contactText: For any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@orgai.net.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Welcome to OrgAi.net. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.
privacyPolicy.description: OrgAi is your premier AI tool directory, dedicated to helping you discover the latest and most effective AI tools tailored to your needs.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: We collect the following user data: name, email, and payment information. Additionally, we collect non-personal data through web cookies.
privacyPolicy.purposeText: The data collected is used for order processing.
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: We do not share your data with any other parties.
privacyPolicy.childrenPrivacyText: We do not collect any data from children.
privacyPolicy.updatesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Users will be notified of any changes via email.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at support@orgai.net.
